name: Taikyoku Igo: Idaten
overview: Taikyoku Igo: Idaten ("Playing Go: Idaten") is a Go game for the Super Famicom and the follow up to Bullet-Proof Software's Taikyoku Igo: Goliath from 1993. The game has numerous customization options for the size of the board and the difficulty of the opponent. As well as standard Go games, the player can also attempt instance puzzles where they have a limited amount of time and moves to beat the opponent with a pre-determined board layout.
